course_description: This half-semester course is designed to provide students with exposure to behavioral finance. We¿ll begin with an overview of behavioral biases documented in the cognitive psychology literature and then discuss their implications for finance.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
schedule_location: Th 1pm-4pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W521
sections: Class Nbr: 2535, Section #: 5101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-4p, Instructor: C. Green, Status: Open
